Articles.Content: Well, my new Carrier, the Maelstrom-Class Mk I (thinking of changing it to just Maelstrom Mk I), is under construction.

ok. Can I send two 51 ton Drekevak Fifteens instead?

Ikr, fubar....

Just in case you wern't confused before... there is a NEW version of the Drekevak!

meet the XIV-III.

CHANGES:

-Went from 6 PASMs to 4 Hidden Lance PASMs

-Added a bit of Zokesian Blue to the fins and emblem, and some Grey to other areas to make the hull one color. The ship is still mostly grey/unpainted though.

-Weight is now 100.58 tons.

Oh, and I am going to release the ORIGINAL DREK XIV-I!

I'm doing this because the XIV-III is so much farther ahead of the XIV-I in armor, armament, and most importantly, engine systems. so Enjoy.

So I think i'm going to start downsizing my ships. Just seems to me that with weaponry always being ahead of armoring, the best defense is having smaller ships

Then again, I might still try to make something ginormous that is invincible to all weaponry lol

So I think i'm going to start downsizing my ships. Just seems to me that with weaponry always being ahead of armoring, the best defense is having smaller ships

Alright, not that small lol. That's a drone fighter with a missile, not a ship

I'm thinking like no more than 50 tons for any ship

Probe Tek, you have stolen my logo, this means war.

In other news, I port-forwarded my computer, so I can host KMP now, yay! If only someone could show me how to install it, that is.

WELCOME,have a Sickle.

Bah, that thing is bulky! You should see some of my designs.
I'm interested in starting a battle with someone. No guarantee I'll be much of a challenge, but this sounds interesting and I'd like to try it out. Any takers for a newb battle??

Probe Tek, you have stolen my logo, this means war.

If you don't stop that I'm going to tell people to ignore you.

EXTRA:I got below 0.5 but the whole thing lacked armor,restock ability,decent range and was reliant on sunlight for power.
noone has still added a challenger to my challenge

I'm interested in starting a battle with someone. No guarantee I'll be much of a challenge, but this sounds interesting and I'd like to try it out. Any takers for a newb battle??

Hmm maybe I could take someone on thats more of my level of experience. I also haven't done much military work lately so I'm a bit rusty.

Hmm maybe I could take someone on thats more of my level of experience. I also haven't done much military work lately so I'm a bit rusty.

Awesome, I'm not 100% clear on how this is supposed to work (like, do I have to claim an area in the Kerbol system before I can fight?) so maybe you should initiate the battle?
Eh we kinda just pick a spot in the kerbol system Agree on what the max tonnage of our ships are and what type of ships we will be using then make a persist file and battle.

Alright well how about this then, maybe we could do a bit of a light skirmish, seeing as how I have never done this before:

Total mass: 200 T

Total number of ships: 5 or fewer (just to keep the battle shorter-ish)

Max parts < 400 per ship (really anything above this my comp doesnt handle too well.

Location: Duna

Sound decent enough?

Ya I'll start preparing a persist may be out tonight but probably tomorrow because I also need to polish some of my unfinished ship designs. Also be sure to get familiar with the rules because I wasn't and it was quite embarrassing.
Gotcha, will do!

Alrighty got a persistence ready rather quickly.

Two of my new experimental Frigates in place weighing in at 88 tons and 331 parts.

One of my fighters weighing in at 23 tons.

I have placed 3 ships all weight counting up to 199-200 tons.(I might be .5 tons over the limit if thats ok )
